I love this game. 
As survivor you have not kill and just to survive either you help your teammates or u sacrifice them. As killer u also not have to kill and show mercy or play with the survivors or u show the terror of horror and death.
No damned shooting around, no child is spamming the chat (voice and key), it's just relaxing, very high tension.
You should just try it out and have fun like many others. 
Again just play it.

I really want to like this game, but after playing more of it, its getting harder to enjoy it. You join a match, anticipation is building and everything is going to well and then you see the killer just standing slashing like an idiot. Just like that your fun is ruined. You join another and guess what? IT HAPPENS AGAIN. This is the 4th time I joined a match where a bunch of assholes are just farming the game for blood points and there is no way to hold them accountable. It ruins the entire night, I invite friends to hang out and play the game and we keep running into asswipes farming or lagging servers to get easier kills. And playing as the killer can be really frustrating when all you come across is a bunch of window spammers. You might be tempted to think up some bullshit about how window spamming is fair, but its not. I have and entire team that would all run to the same area and jump in and out of the window while they all mocked me and then got pissed after I quit the match. There are a ton of balancing problems with the game. Idk why there are so many people that thinks its ok to farm the game, for what fucking purpose? To be better or somthing? Its a total buzz kill. There also isnt enough content in the game for the price they are asking. All the customizable options for characters are some of the most un inspired bullshit I have ever seen.

Dead by Daylight (DbD) эта та игра, где опасный противник не маньяк, а твои тиммейты.
Сюжет! Какой сюжет? 5 студентов  потерялись в лесу, а добрый маньяк поможет им убиться об стену и повисеть на крюке.
На данный момент есть пять выживших и четыре маньяка. У каждого свои уникальные перки.

Выжившие:
1) Мэг Томас, спринтер от бога; (3 самообучающих перка) (Быстро и Тихо) , (Взрывной Бег) , (Адреналин) 
2) Джейк Парк (Киркоров), ломать - не строить; (3 самообучающих перка) (Железная Воля) , (Саботаж) , (Спокойный Дух)
3) Дуайт Фэрфилд, типа лидер группы; (3 самообучающих перка) (Связь) , (Лидер) , (Проявить себя)
4) Клодетт Морель, сам себе врач; (3 самообучающих перка) (Сам себе доктор) , (Ботаника), (сострадание или же сопереживание)
5) Ниа Карлссон, прыжок веры. (3 самообучающих перка) (Мягкое приземление) , (Городское бегство) , (Уличная мудрость)

Маньяки: Тоже имеют по 3 самообучающих перка 
1) Траппер (капканщик), морской бой (тонко, но люди оценят шутку); (Агитация) , (Зверская сила) , (Безумие )
2) Призрак, игра в прятки (инвизник) ; (Xищник) , (Сыщик) , (Родившийся в тени)
3) Бензопильщик (Хилл Билли), беги или умри; (бензопила утроенная скорость с бензопилой) (Несокрушимый) , (Ремонтник) , (Родившиеся при свете) 
4) Медсестра, игра в "Портал"; (телепортация) (Танатофобия) , (Зов Медсестры) , (Страйдор)

Смысл игры такой, выжившие должны сбежать с карты (местности), но сначала надо починить генераторы и открыть ворота и не попасться в объятия маньяка:)
А маньяк должен их найти и повесить на крюк, перед тем как они сбегут с карты...

Выжившим и маньякам, даются перки и подношения, которые улучшают навыки и тактики. (Можно улучшать в кровавой паутине, за кровавые очки, которые даются за победу или проигрыш) (за проигрыш меньше :DD)

Графика: меня в полне устраивает, предает мрачности ( 8 из 10);
Геймплей: однообразен, но мне не надоедает. Все время держит в напряжении (10 из 10);
Музыка и звуки: Хорошие для такой игры, особенно тема маньяка в лобби (9 из 10);
Управление: Хорошое для клавиатуры, отличное для геймпада. (9 из 10);
Онлайн: Тут разработчики, до ума никак не доведут (Ошибка соединения, выход в меню, ждем хороший сетевой код + может попасться маньяк с плохим интернетом! ) ( 6 из 10); 

Итого: 9 двайтов из 10 трапперов:)
Советую брать, если любите выживать!

Being a killer versus being a survivor is its own different game for each.  Being a survivor is terrifying and nerve wracking as you try not to be found.  Being a killer is empowering as you fight a "clock" to track down the survivors before they escape.  Both have their own unique strategies you have to use and adapt.  The variety of killers and the random generation of maps give this game a ton of replay value.  Usually I don't play many games that are in an arena of sorts like this one, but this has me continuously coming back.

I can get into the game fine in the main menu and everything, but when the match is loading, it literally freezes. Then it goes with a black screen for five minutes then back to the loading screen. Really upset by this and it lags a lot.

I feel like this amazing game can be summed up with a very simple quote... "No matter how bad you play or how far you fall, rank 20 will ALWAYS be there to catch you <3"

Bonjour, 

J'ai acheté Dead By Daylight  pour  jouer avec des amis. Pour un jeu qui est 100% mulijoueur, je trouve dommage que le plus gros défaut du jeu soit  un gros  problème de MATCHMAKING. 

10 min dans le loby a attendre le bon vouloir du jeu a nous trouver une partie en ligne pour  3min de game réel. Bilan sur  3h de jeu total au conteur, j'ai passé réelement 1 heure de game multijoueur. 

Ce n'est pas une alpha, ni une béta, mais bien un jeu fini qui est sortie y'a plus d'un ans (Date de parution : 14 juin 2016) Coop /multi seulement. Et je le note juste  pour cette raison! 

J'ai donc fais  une demande de rembourcement! Je n'ai pas voulu croire  les évalutations des joueurs sur se sujet, mais elles sont fondés.
best horror game
Great survivor game with an intense atmosphere feeling like you are the victim in a slasher movie. 10+ for Dead by Daylight.

El juego en sí me gusta, entretiene mucho y más si juegas con amigos, si puedes claro. 20 putos minutos para encontrar una partida con un amigo, después de darle 35.000 veces a listo y por supuesto, después de ver pantallas de carga fallidas, en las que te envía de nuevo a la pantalla principal.
Eso con UN SOLO amigo. Si juegas con dos más olvídate de encontrar partida. Es más problable de que puedas jugar buscando individualmente.
¿Podríais hacer un sistema de búsqueda decente e inteligente para no tener que darle 2 millones de veces al botón LISTO? ¿TAN DIFÍCIL ES? 
Lo dicho, el juego está muy bien, pero el sistema de búsqueda lo jode todo. Mientras no se arregle mantendré esta valoración negativa.

Edito: Ya han arreglado los problemas para encontrar partida en grupo. Ahora sí que recomiendo este juego.

I do recommend this game since I would say it is one of the best games on steam. I have looked for many games on steam but this game was like one of many that I really enjoyed. [h1]Dead by Dwightlight[/h1]

Ich spiele das Spiel nun schon seit Längerem und habe, vielleicht nicht jedes Match, auch immer viel Spaß. Manchmal dauert es etwas eine Lobby zu finden, manchmal hat man dumme Mitspieler dabei, manchmal gibt es hier und da ein Bug, aber im Großen und Ganzen habe ich nun schon knapp 80h in das Spiel investiert und bin mir sehr sicher, dass noch einige Stunden mehr dazu kommen werden. Vor allem zusammen mit Freunden zu spielen macht Riesen-Spaß, einfach, da man sich dann besser absprechen und taktisch vorgehen kann.
Die Entwickler sind stets darum bemüht ihr Spiel zu verbessern, wie auch neue Maps, Survivor und Killer mit einzubringen. 

Zusammengefasst: Ich empfehle das Spiel weiter. Es macht einen Riesen-Spaß. Wer hier und da mal einen Bug oder schlechte Mitspieler verkraften kann, ist gut in der DbD Community aufgehoben :)

The premise is awesome, the execution is not. 

For the moment I can't recommend it. Just in the last week or two I have had random CTDs for no apparent reason. It's unfortunate really, because when the game works it's really fun. 

I'll try playing again after the next patch. For now it's thumbs down.

EDIT:

The game has improved over time, and I'd say it's worth the asking price at this point (esp. considering the time I've gotten out of it). There are still some bugs and what not, as well as a  community that is mostly toxic, but the game can be a lot of fun.

Let me start by saying that I have alwas been a fan of horror survival. No, not horror action; running around as some roid rager shooting up "zombies" or the equivalent. But true horror survival, where your wits and mind are what keep you alive and on the edge of your seat. 
That being said I haven't had this much fun with a game since the Fatal Frame series. Playing as the killer takes on another perspective in the horror survival world and is brillantly executed in this game. I absolutley love it and if I was a rich gal' I' dbuy a copy for all my friends. Best game in years.
This is a good game would buy again 6/5
The devs have fixed most of the bugs. The game is pretty fun now, although there needs to be some changes to things like player level and devotion, they are just too pointless
这个游戏除了有许多改档、bug及外挂以外其实是一款游戏性很强的抓人游戏。

I don't know why I love this game so much. It must be the chase and being chased. There are times when you're juking the killer and he doesnt know where you went.

Then there are times when, "Overconfidence is a slow and insidious killer." You try to stun or outplay a killer, and you get killed because of poor internet connection.

GG well played, this game made me into a Dad by Daylight with a drinking problem.

"The Game" itself is really awesome and has a ton of potential, but unfortunately "The Systems" around the game NEED SERIOUS WORK.

The Rank System is too difficult and counter intuitive to the game itself, at times. Winning too fast and totally dominating the match can Rank you down. Being too good at the game can Rank you down. You need to play "to farm" instead of "play to win" most of the time. It's not a very enjoyable experience to play Ranked in this game.

The Lobby/Matchmaking System completely sucks.It matches people-up with WILDLY different Skill-levels, and Queue-Dodgers do not get time-outs that should increase with each lobby that is dodged. People are constantly queue-dodging lobbies, which makes starting an actual match and playing the game a nightmare at times.

The Disconnect/Network System does not auto-reconnecting players back to a game when they disconnected, even if they log-back-in within less than a minute. Also, disconnected player's character models disappear from the game world, instead of being left in the game to be interacted with. There is also a ton of lag in-game some times while other games are amazing with no lag. It can be wildly different between matches, and you never know what you're going to get.

The Anti-Cheat/Exploit Systems ARE NOT WORKING and there are obvious cheaters/exploiters in the game. People with Prestige and Level 50, with 4 Ultra Rare Perks, but only have 5 hours of game time played is an impossibility.

The Server System is non-existent. This game should have been a Client-Server architecture, but instead they went with P2P and saving Player Data on the Client. This is a HORRIBLE idea, which is just asking for cheating/exploiting/lag-switching. The game should have had dedicated servers, where our Player Data lives at, and where matches take place on. Dedicated servers would have made the game experience WAY BETTER. What a huge missed opportunity.

The Company itself (Behaviour Interactive) has been super bad with their Community Managers, when it comes to communicating and addressing issues with the community and competitive players on the Steam forums.

Again, the game itself is good and has potential, but the systems that surround the game are really beyond freaking horrible and too frustrating to make for an enjoyable experience at the moment.

I hate this game so much, there's a whole lot wrong with it. Bugs, imbalance, lazy devs

Anyways time to do my tome challenges

Diese Review stellt nur meine subjektive Meinung dar und soll lediglich zur Kaufentscheidung beitragen.

Dead By Daylight ist seit dem Steam Summer Sale 2016 in meiner Spieleliste und ich konnte bisher ein paar dutzende Spielstunden investieren. Für ein Spiel, welches ich nicht annähernd auf dem Radar hatte, hat es mich stark positiv überrascht.
Die Tatsache, ein Katz-Maus-Spiel in einer surrealen Welt mit einem Killer und 4 Überlebenden stattfinden zu lassen, bewährt sich auch nach langer Spielzeit noch als abwechselnd. Findet man erst einmal Gefallen daran, will man umso mehr experimentieren und erforschen. Auch die Hintergrundgeschichte (Lore) stimmt sich mit der Atmosphäre überein und sorgt zusätzlich für einen ganz eigenene makaberen Beigeschmack. 

Das Gameplay gestaltet sich als durchaus überschaubar und leicht erlernbar. Wo man am Anfang noch Probleme hat in der Ausübung bestimmter Tätigkeiten (Wie das schnelle Bewegen über Hindernisse oder das Umwerfen einer Pallette in die richtige Richtung), so sind diese doch recht schnell erlernt. Alles in allem läuft das Spiel auch auf etwas älteren Rechnern stabil (Specs s.u.).
Vor allem das Überleben/Töten in Gemeinschaft ist ein großer Anreiz. So gibt es zwar starke Probleme zu bestimmten Uhrzeiten mit einer bestimmten Gruppengröße eine Lobby zu finden, jedoch lässt sich dies mit den Downloadregionen über Steam regulieren.

Die Grafik erweist sich als solide und schön anzusehen. Für heutige Verhältnisse und der Tatsache, dass es ein Indie Spiel ist, verdienen die Entwickler ein großes Lob hierfür. 

Bugs und Glitches gibt es - natürlich - auch welche. Manche können sogar den Spielspaß ziemlich in den Keller drücken. So bekommt man unter seltenen Umständen ein falsches Blutnetz zugeteilt, mit welchem man seinen Charakter verbessern und ausbauen kann. Manchmal stürzt das Spiel ohne Fehlermeldung ab. Das einzige was einem in diesem Moment bleibt, ist ein Error Report Fenster, um den Developern zu erklären, wie es dazu kam. 
Diese "kleinen Missgeschehnisse" sind aber dann doch eher die Seltenheit.

Zusammengefasst ist Dead By Daylight ein grandioses Spiel für langanhaltende Schock- und Horrormomente. Hier kommt jeder (ab 18 Jahren...) auf seinen Spaßfaktor, sofern er sich mit solch einem Universum auseinandersetzen mag/kann. 
Das Entwicklerteam arbeitet stets an Bugfixes und ist sehr aktiv im Social Media Bereich (jede Woche ein Livestream der Devs und ein großes Steaminternes Forum). Erst vor Kurzem erschien das DLC "The Last Breath" mit einem neuen Killer, einer neuen Überlebenden, einer neuen Karte und etlichen Bugfixes.
Ich kann dieses Spiel getrost weiterempfehlen und es jenen ans Herz legen, die schon immer mal die Entscheidung treffen wollten, ihre Freunde am Haken elendig verenden zu lassen oder ihnen doch von jenem herunterhelfen... ;-)


[Specs]
Graka: GeForce GTX760
CPU: AMD Phenom X6 1090T 3.20 GHz
OS: Win 10 Pro 64x
RAM: 8 GB

Hace tiempo puse una critica bastante negativa por la gestión que estaba teniendo este juego, he de decir que desde hace un tiempo ha mejorado bastante, parece que el equipo de desarrollo se esta poniendo las pilas y ofreciendo un buen producto a la comunidad, por lo tanto cambio mi critica a positiva.

Buen juego, para echarte unas risas con los colegas o tu solo, van actualizando a menudo, poniendo nuevo contenido y mejoras gráficas, eso se agradece y mucho que no lo tengan olvidado.

NOTE:
First of all, in my almost 30 hours of Gameplay, most of the time I am playing as a Survivor. So this a Survivor-only point of view type of review.

FIRST PART OF REVIEW (LONG VERSION)*
*TL;DR version on the bottom of this review

This game shines in the first time you play it. Great atmosphere, the ambient sound effects add to the suspense. Also, you never know what to expect, since at first there are four (five now) types of killers, each with their unique skills.

Now, when you get the hang of it, it would seem a little bit repetitive, since it has only one goal: Escape from wherever you are by powering-up two metal doors using Five generators scattered throughout the map. There are different types of maps, although it WILL feel the same as you play along.

The thing that keeps me from playing this is by unlocking various skills as your chosen Survivor character levels up, called perks - which can greatly increase your chance of survival.

The only bad thing that I am greatly annoyed at this game is its awful matchmaking. It's tedious. Especially when you're in groups. And also, no in-game chat, which is understandable, since it would make it easy for survivors to reunite if ever there was an in-game chat.

Overall, a mediocre multiplayer horror-survival game that has its fair share of intense moments. Much greater when you play with friends. 


SECOND PART OF REVIEW (TL;DR VERSION)

PROS
+ Enjoyable early-game
+ Best when played with friends
+ Has its fair share of intense moments
+ You can unlock skills which are beneficial to your survival
+ Ambient sounds add up to the suspense
+ Environment is creepy-ish, adds to the suspense, but not Silent Hill level


CONS
- Repetitive
- Bad matchmaking system
- Has only ONE game mode
- Not-so-much enjoyable when playing alone
- Laggy host means laggy game. Should have dedicated servers

Rating:
Graphics: 5.5/10
Gameplay: 6/10
Sounds: 7.5/10
Replayability: 7/10

Overall Rating: 6.5/10

Ce jeu est simplement un scandale, impossible d'y jouer si vous êtes 2 joueurs ou plus, le matchmaking est simplement catastrophique. Il faut en moyenne PLUS DE 30 MINUTES pour trouver une partie avec des amis, partie qui peut durer 10 minutes... 

Cerise sur le gateau, si vous pensiez pouvoir faire autre chose pendant la recherche de partie vous vous êtes mis le doigt dans l'oeil bien profondement, parce qu'il faut que vous et vos amis restiez scotché comme des idiots sur devant vos ecrans à spamer le bouton "pret" vu que toutes les 5 secondes le jeu vous dit "pas de partie trouvée! Cliquer sur "pret" toutes les 5 secondes pendant 30 minutes ça fait 360 fois "pret": un max de fun. 

Je ne compte plus le nombre de fois où on a abandonné tellement on en avait marre. Vendre un jeu multijoueur sans avoir mis au point une chose d'aussi basique que la recherche de partie est au mieux de l'arnaque.

说实话我觉的没毛病。整个游戏紧张激烈，而且充满乐趣。各个角色的设定给人丰富的游戏体验，但是美中不足的是改档的人太多。影响游戏体验。某些屠夫技能太强势，新手玩家的匹配遇到这些屠夫基本上就是被屠杀。希望能更加平衡一下。毕竟人类不好当啊。随时都有掉段的危险。不说了，继续我的杀鸡之旅了。

This is one of my new favorite games. I always loved survival horror, and this game will scare the hell out of you. It's great fun and I highly recommend it. 

As for the cons, the matchmaking is unbalanced. Many times I've hosted a game as the killer, which my highest is Trapper 10, Wraith 10, Hillbillly 8 & Nurse 1 with a killer rank of 15, and got into lobbies with people who are well over lvl 25 and several times with Rank 1 survivors. 

Also, unless you have 4 other friends to play with, you can't play a full game together. There's no fun or real challenge when it's 1vs1 or 1 vs 2. My brother & I have grouped up as survivors and constantly get the "Cannot find game" message. 

If you're trying to play an online game, you cannot invite someone to play with you. They'll get the invite, but won't be able to join. And Survive With Friends (SWF) is broken.

Despite these problems, this is still my #1 game right now. I had my doubts after the abysmal Evolve (4vs1) but this game (despite its current matchmaking flaws) has exceeded my expectations.

If you're a fan of the old stalk & slash movies of the 80's, this fits right in.

*edit* The DEV's have no idea what the fuck they're doing.
NO MATCHMAKING NO LIVE !!
Its a drug. I cant stop.

Having spent much time in this game I guess it's time for a review.

First of all I'd like to say that even thought this game had some problems, which persist although dwindling, Dead by Daylight is a jewel of 1v4 horror.

It executed the atmosphere perfectly and the variety of killers and survivors brings even more depth to the game, as well as the randomized stages.

Every single session is unique and affected not only by the player controlled killer's abilities and overall experience, but also on the teamwork (if players choose to help eachother or go for the "every man for himself thing"), the player controlled survivors and the variety of their abilities.

The devs proved that they wish to add more to this game and not, by any means, take advantage of the same p2p or p2w system implemented by other games. Since its starting price was the only price I paid and the DLC was absolutely free.

For a game worth 20eu it is absolutely great what the devs managed to do and even after +100hs in I still love to continue playing it.

The only reasons I can't give this game a 10/10 is because of the horrible matchmaking, which I sincerely hope is something in the process of perfecting, since it is either a ready simulator or a "failed to find a game" often appearing text.

Still, the execution and the whole idea is extremely well done and I not only recommend buying it as a sale but for its full price!

Overall 8/10!!! Great work devs!!!
黎明杀机真心好玩！

I'll try my best to sum it up. I don't have a huge amount of hours but this is my opinion of it.

Basically, this is a great game to play if you've got people to play with. You and three of your friends can go online and try to survive against a random killer and have fun escaping him. Or if there is 5 of you, a private server is always a great way to pass a few hours laughing with your friends.

Unfortunately, due to the nature of the game, there's not a huge amount of replayablitlity. Granted, there are four killers to play and all of the survivors have unique abilities if you play them long enough but honestly, you need to play a long time to unlock them. I've only hit level 8 or so on one survivor and not much really came out of it.

If you're looking for a fun game to play with friends, this will do you well. However, I wouldn't put money on this keeping you occupied for a long time. But it's still worth playing nonetheless. I would recommend playing the free weekends of this game to experience it first.

推荐有耐心的玩家购买。我反正被一起开黑的玩家溜烦了。加上游戏经常崩溃，好不容易升段位了，一崩就掉段😒搞得我好像很输不起一样。经常要瞪大眼睛盯着屏幕，从此佩服那些游戏主播，一玩就玩一晚上，他们眼睛可真好

So nachdem ich dieses Spiel jetzt ca. 2 Wochen gespielt habe, hier meine Erfahrungen damit:

Das Spiel macht unglaublich viel Spaß und ist durch die Vielzahl an Möglichkeiten bis jetzt noch nicht Langweilig geworden. Allerdings gibt es einige Dinge die manchmal sehr an den Nerven zerren. Zuerst sei hier die Spiellobby erwähnt. Ich weiß nicht was die Entwickler hier für ein Problem haben, aber jeder der dieses Spiel ein paar Mal gespielt hat weiß, dass es einfach nur Schlimm ist. Man benötigt zum Teil eine halbe Stunde bis man ein Spiel gefunden hat und ein anderes Mal nur 2 Sekunden (??). Ab und zu hängt das Spiel sich dann auch noch auf nachdem man gefühlte 1000 Anläufe genommen hat. Zum anderen ist das Verständnis von Teamplay bei den Überlebenden meistens nicht Vorhanden, was manchmal sehr anstrengend sein kann. Nichtsdestotrotz kann ich das Spiel jedem empfehlen der Lust auf ein bisschen Panik und Angstschweis hat.



Update zu meinem vorherigen Review (Patch 1.2) :

Über das Spiel lässt sich nach dem Patch sagen, dass zumindest die Einzelspieler Lobby jetzt gefixt wurde und bis jetzt ohne viel Bereit drücken und stundenlangem Warten einwandfrei funktioniert. Allerdings ist zumindest momentan der Modus mit Freunden spielen völlig gecrashed  und nicht nutzbar.

Update vom 1.10.2016

Der Modus mit Freude spielen funktioniert wieder auch wenn man eine ganze Weile warten muss.
游戏性不错，如果是本地游戏就可以。网络这一方面很渣。4个萌新匹配到排位5的？怎么弄的？而且我这断了一下王，再连上去瞬间成1J.所以说，差评。

Diese Spiel ist einfach nur der Hammer. Dieses Feeling und der Nervenkitzel ist einfach nur der Hammer wie die Entwickler es umgesetzt haben. Bis auf den bugs die manchmal sogar lustig sind. 

Favit: das spiel muss man sich holen!!

From what I can tell so far, this game rocks! If you have 4 other friends who are playing with you. If you don't, you're pretty much doomed to wait in the lobby until 4 other people want to play and a killer hosts a game. I've been dropped from a few games as well. 

I think there should be some kind of offline version for people who are new to the game, since every matchup I've been in so far is with and against seasoned players with seious perks. 

That all said, I do like this game and the ability to go between keyboard and controller when playing. 

If/When they fix the bugs and add an offline version, I'll totally reccomend this game to others.

Right now? I'm trying to find 4 people to play with so I can actually enjoy the game.

UPDATE: Now with the ragion lock, I'm doomed to only play as survivor. There are almost no players in my region that play as survivor and lots of people playing killer. Makes those events that call for you to play both near impossible to complete without outright paying and that sucks for people like me who live paycheck to paycheck. I'm willing to spend for the dlc when I have it, but to have to buy outfits others can outright play to get, just sucks. I shouldn't have to wait 1-2 hours to get a full lobby when others can get them in a few minutes, just to play for 5 minutes and do the wait all over again.
